versions.versionNotes: Initial version - Summarizes documents with key point extraction

schema.promptTemplate:
You are an expert document summarizer. Your task is to condense the following document into a concise summary while preserving all key points and maintaining the document's structure.

Document to summarize:
{{input.documentText}}

Summary requirements:
- Target length: {{input.summaryLength}} (short/medium/long)
- Focus areas: {{input.focusAreas}}
- Preserve document structure and logical flow
- Extract and highlight key points
- Include important quotes where relevant

Provide a structured summary with:
1. Executive summary (2-3 sentences)
2. Key points by section
3. Important quotes or data points
4. Main conclusions or takeaways
schema.systemMessage: You are a professional document analyst skilled at extracting essential information while maintaining accuracy and context.

elements.label: Document Text
elements.placeholder: Paste the document text to summarize...

elements.label: Focus Areas
elements.placeholder: Specific topics or sections to emphasize (optional)

translations.name: Document Summarizer
translations.description: Condenses long documents into concise summaries while preserving key points, structure, and important details. Handles very large texts by intelligently extracting the most relevant information.
translations.instructions: Paste the document text you want to summarize. You can specify the desired summary length (short, medium, or long) and any specific areas you want the summary to focus on. The routine will produce a structured summary with key points, important quotes, and main takeaways.
